\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLWorksheet Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}\index{OpenXLSX::XLWorksheet@{OpenXLSX::XLWorksheet}}


A class encapsulating an Excel worksheet. Access to \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} objects should be via the workbook object.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLSheet.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
A class encapsulating an Excel worksheet. Access to \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}} objects should be via the workbook object. Inheritance diagram for Open\+XLSX\+::XLWorksheet\+:\begin{figure}[H]
